name: CustomerSure
tag_list: saas, customer-feedback-software, small-business-software, customer-service-software, customer-satisfaction-software, software, business-software
overview:
CustomerSure is simple web-based software to help businesses collect and act on feedback.

Using CustomerSure, a business can create a dedicated customer service area for their website, which makes it easy to:

  • Create quick and effective satisfaction surveys
  • Gather feedback through multiple feedback tools
  • Share real-time feedback with their whole team
  • Manage actions and responses for every piece of feedback
  • Monitor and report on levels of customer satisfaction
  • Publish feedback and responses, independently hosted by CustomerSure.

The business benefits through improving customer satisfaction, which increases levels or retention and referral, and ultimately leads to a stronger reputation for exceptional customer service.

The company was founded in 2010 by the former head of Customer Service for Sage UK.
